title: Assortment of Prewar cards for sale

posts.post_title: Assortment of Prewar cards for sale
posts.post_content:
Assortment of prewar cards for sale. Prices include shipping. Check, MO, Paypal accepted. Thanks for looking.

posts.post_content: All remaining cards have been moved to ebay auction, 99cent starting, no reserve.
